meanings.sent1: The small umbrella was apt for the light rain.

meanings.sent5: The colorful painting was apt to catch the eye of any visitor.

meanings.definition: Likely or inclined to do something
meanings.sent1: He is apt to arrive early for meetings.
meanings.sent2: She is apt to forget her keys when in a rush.
meanings.sent3: The sleepy cat is apt to nap in the warm sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: The adventurous child is apt to explore every corner of the park.
meanings.sent5: The curious puppy is apt to chase after butterflies in the garden.
